attributes.action: abolish the present class riden honour system for the armed forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The present honour system for the armed forces is based on class/rank.
for example a private soldier will never be able to obtain a knight hood, he would only ever be given a obe, why??? .
This totally unacceptable in this current climate, of our brave soldiers giving up there lives in iraq, honour them with equal honours!!!
